posts.title: websocket调整字节缓存大小
posts.slug: websocket调整默认字节缓存大小
posts.text: 方案一：使用代码修改12345678910@Configurationpublic class WebAppRootContext implements ServletContextInitializer { @Override public void onStartup(ServletContext servletContext) throws ServletException { servletContext.addListener(WebAppRootListener.class); servletContext.setInitParameter("org.apache.tomcat.websocket.textBufferSize","16384"); }} 方案二： 添加启动参数1java -Dorg.apache.tomcat.websocket.DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE=16384 -jar xxx.jar
